question: What is the objective of the 'CREDAI Awaas' mobile application, recently launched by CREDAI?
option2: Ease of purchase of Residential properties
answer: Ease of purchase of Residential properties
explanation:
Confederation of Real Estate Developersâ€™ Associations of India (CREDAI) is the apex body of Private Real Estate Developers Associations. It has launched a mobile application called \'CREDAI Awaas\', which aims to facilitate ease of purchase of residential properties by homebuyers.
Through this application, a credible platform is created for prospective home buyers so that they identify suitable Residential properties and contact their developers directly. The details of the CREDAI member developers are displayed in the application.
